channel.title: Help | Need Help With Run.bat for client
channel.description:
Hi, When i try to open the run.bat for my client it says this (heres pic)
[URL=http://img63.imageshack.us/i/capturenq.png/][IMG]http://img63.imageshack.us/img63/3531/capturenq.th.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]

item.title: Help | Need Help With Run.bat for client
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:8, topic:341975”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=438385.msg3221848#msg3221848 date=1275245994]

@echo off title Run start java -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause
[/quote]

Javac.exe compiles Java files, it should be Java or Javaw.[/quote]-.-

Read full topic
item.source: Help | Need Help With Run.bat for client

item.title: Help | Need Help With Run.bat for client
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:7, topic:341975”]@echo off title Run start javac -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause[/quote]

Javac.exe compiles Java files, it should be Java or Javaw.

Read full topic

item.title: Help | Need Help With Run.bat for client
item.dc:creator: @slow_pk_scape slow pk scape
item.description:
@slow_pk_scape wrote:

pure2ownage:

its supposed to be “javac” not “javaw” post your run code here.

@echo off
TITLE Run
start javaw -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0
exit

iv installed jkd what els do i need

Read full topic
item.source: Help | Need Help With Run.bat for client

item.title: Help | Need Help With Run.bat for client
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:4, topic:341975”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=438385.msg3221772#msg3221772 date=1275242792]
Javaw.exe is the equivalent of Java.exe but it doesn’t have a console.
[/quote]stop correcting me kyle.[/quote]
Stop making silly mistakes and I wont have to

Read full topic
